hadiths.text: This hadith has been transmitted on the authority of Ma'mar (and the words are):I said to Zuhri: What does (the word) al-'Aqib imply? He said: One after whom there is no Prophet, and in the hadith transmitted on the authority of Ma'mar and 'Uqail there is a slight variation of wording

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي أَسْمَائِهِ صلى الله عليه وسلم .
